tool_description:
UKRail is an API for UK railway train times. Sourced from National Rail Enquiries live departure boards SOAP web service (OpenLDBWS) 

Their webservice can be, to put it mildly, tricky to work with so UKRail aims to make things a little easier!

Suited for small businesses who may want to leverage rail data on a website or phone app.

Additionally, it is Ideal for train enthusiasts who may want to use data from the live departure boards for one of their projects - model railways (including mi...
name: UKRail
title: UKRail

api_list.name: /GetUKRail
api_list.description: Query the API to get rail data.
